default.notDisplayedCorrectly: Is this mail not displaying correctly?
default.notDisplayedCorrectlyLink: View this email in your browser

ActivityInvitation.subject: YOUPERS: Invitation to join activity from __inviting.fullname__
ActivityInvitation.text: __inviting.fullname__ has invited you to participate in a group activity

CampaignLeadInvite.subject: YOUPERS: Invitation from __inviting.fullname__ to become campaign leader
CampaignLeadInvite.text: __inviting.fullname__ has invited you to become campaign leader for the YOUPERS __campaign.title__ HealthCampaign.

OrganizationAdminInvite.subject: YOUPERS: Invitation to become Organization Administrator from __inviting.fullname__
OrganizationAdminInvite.text:
__inviting.fullname__ has invited you to become organization administrator for __organization.name__.

To accept this invitation please click on this link:

passwordReset.subject: YOUPERS: Password reset requested
passwordReset.text:
It's easy to change your password! Simply click on the link below and follow the instructions.

Thank you!

Your YOUPERS Team

emailVerification.subject: YOUPERS: Please verify your email address
emailVerification.text:
Thank you for your registration!

You have entered __user.email__ as your contact email address. We want to be sure, this email address belongs to you. Just click on the link below to verify your email address.

Thank you!

Your YOUPERS Team

new.subject: YOUPERS: New Calendar-Entry for: __activity.title__
new.text:
Congratulations! By scheduling __activity.title__ you have already accomplished an important step!

You can add the events for this activity to your calendar with the link below.

If you do not want to receive emails like this in the future, you can disable it in your profile.

update.subject: YOUPERS: Updated Calendar-Entry for: __activity.title__
update.text:
The plans for __activity.title__ have changed in the meantime. You can use the link below to update your calendar.

If you do not want to receive emails like this in the future, you can disable it in your profile.

cancel.subject: YOUPERS: Cancelled Calendar-Entry for: __activity.title__
cancel.text:
The activity __activity.title__ has been cancelled. You can use the link below to update your calendar.

If you do not want to receive emails like this in the future, you can disable it in your profile.
